channel.title: configuration on PR
channel.description: Recent content in configuration on PR

item.title: Dev Diary: Apple Pay
item.description: I’ve recently integrated Apple Pay for an iOS app. Though I have heard it is very easy to integrate and lot of tutorials available, I could not find overall requirements/activities involved in integrating Apple Pay.

item.title: Integrating Chromecast with Kaltura SDK (iOS)
item.description: Their documentation says it is built in, but I couldn’t find a sample anywhere, so here it is for everyone on how to integrate Chromecast with your Kaltura Player.

item.title: Swift/Objective-C Interoperability - Behind the "Configure Bridging Header" dialog
item.description: Disclaimer: Yes, I know about the typo “briding” in screenshots, but I’m lazy to redo all, so please ignore and read the article in peace :-)

item.title: Configuring your Airtel Broadband DSL with your modem + wifi router
item.description: My modem failed last week(frequent drops), and I was not willing to repair this time. I’ve taken a screenshots of configuration from my old modem, with the help I was able to configure my new D-Link 2750u.
